item.title: 通胀侵蚀储蓄，日本家庭开始追逐收益率
item.description: 由于长期通胀侵蚀了现金持有的价值，日本家庭加大了对收益率的追求，首次将风险资产提高到总资产的五分之一以上。【原文：Japan’s households stepped up their quest for yield by boosting risk assets to more than a fifth of their total assets for the first time, as prolonged inflation erodes the value of cash holdings.】

item.title: Grab 支持的超级银行在雅加达首次公开募股 1.68 亿美元后大幅上涨
item.description: 数字银行公司印尼超级银行（PT Super Bank Indonesia）在雅加达首次公开募股后大涨24%，触及日交易上限，成为印尼今年第二大公开募股公司。【原文：Digital banking firm PT Super Bank Indonesia surged 24%, hitting the daily trading limit, on its Jakarta debut following an initial public offering that ranks as Indonesia’s second largest this year.】

item.title: 大量 IT 回购帮助印度 ETF 罕见地跑赢指数
item.description: 印度一家交易所交易基金进行了一次不寻常的交易，帮助它超越了其旨在反映的基准，这在被动投资占主导地位的时代实属罕见。【原文：An unusual trade by an Indian exchange-traded fund has helped it edge past the benchmark it’s designed to mirror, a rarity in an era dominated by passive investing.】

item.title: Coupang 高管因数据泄露事件接受韩国立法者质询
item.description: 愤怒的立法者就韩国有史以来最大的数据泄露事件对 Coupang 的高管进行了质询，听证会气氛紧张，凸显了公众对韩国主要在线零售商日益高涨的愤怒情绪。【原文：Irate lawmakers grilled executives from Coupang over South Korea’s biggest-ever data breach at a testy hearing that underscored rising public anger with the country’s dominant online retailer.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 HashKey 首次亮相香港股价上涨
item.description: 香港最大的持牌加密货币交易所运营商 HashKey Holdings Ltd. 首次公开募股募集了 16 亿港元（2.06 亿美元）资金，其股价在首次公开募股后攀升。【原文：Shares of HashKey Holdings Ltd., operator of Hong Kong’s largest licensed cryptocurrency exchange, climbed on their trading debut after an initial public offering that raised HK$1.6 billion ($206 million).】

item.title: 韩国期待美国单独签署建造核潜艇协议
item.description: 韩国国家安全顾问在华盛顿准备会见包括国务卿马可-卢比奥在内的高级官员时表示，韩国可能需要与美国达成单独的双边协议，以确保建造核动力潜艇的权利。【原文：South Korea may need to pursue a separate bilateral accord with the US to secure the right to build nuclear-powered submarines, the country’s national security adviser said as he prepares to meet with senior officials including Secretary of State Marco Rubio in Washington.】

item.title: 卢比下滑凸显印度货币防御的局限性
item.description: 印度卢比最近几周迅速跌至接连创下的新低，这让分析师们对印度央行为何没有采取更有力的干预措施来支撑货币展开了争论。【原文：The Indian rupee’s rapid slide to successive record lows in recent weeks has analysts debating why the central bank has refrained from intervening more forcefully to support the currency.】

item.title: 安达信前合伙人在美国首次公开募股中筹资 1.76 亿美元
item.description: 安达信集团公司（Andersen Group Inc.【原文：Andersen Group Inc., the US arm of the professional services firm that succeeded the shuttered accounting giant Arthur Andersen, raised $176 million in an initial public offering priced at the top of the range.】

item.title: 商界游说团称爱尔兰经济增长将因招聘放缓而放缓
item.description: 爱尔兰最大的商业游说团体预计，由于招聘放缓，2026 年的经济增长将有所放缓。【原文：Ireland’s biggest business lobby group expects economic growth to moderate in 2026 on a hiring slowdown.】

item.title: 美国和欧盟需求增长带动日本出口增长
item.description: 由于美国和欧盟的需求猛增，抵消了对中国出口的下降，日本的出口增幅为 2 月份以来最大。【原文：Japan’s exports rose by the most since February as demand jumped in the US and EU, offsetting a drop in shipments to China.】

item.title: GoTo 的反弹取决于股东投票，Grab 合并有望实现
item.description: 在股东大会召开之前，去哪儿集团的股票出现了新生迹象，这可能有助于为其期待已久的与更大的竞争对手 Grab Holdings Ltd. 的合并铺平道路。【原文：Shares of GoTo Group are seeing signs of new life ahead of a shareholders’ meeting that may help pave the way for its long-awaited merger with larger rival Grab Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 日本考虑从 2027 年起提高所得税以帮助国防筹资
item.description: 日本首相佐那江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）领导的执政联盟正在讨论从 2027 年起提高所得税，以帮助支付更高的国防开支，从而打破在这一问题上长达三年的僵局。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s ruling coalition is discussing raising income taxes from 2027 to help pay for higher defense spending, breaking a three-year stalemate on the issue as mounting geopolitical risks make it more urgent to secure funding sources.】

item.title: 特朗普下令封锁委内瑞拉附近海域油轮后石油价格大涨
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统通过封锁油轮加大对委内瑞拉的压力之后，石油从2021年以来的最低水平上涨，而全球供应过剩膨胀的迹象继续笼罩着市场。【原文：Oil rose from the lowest level since 2021 after President Donald Trump ramped up pressure on Venezuela with a blockade of tankers, while signs of a swelling global glut continue to hang over the market.】

item.title: 惠誉以财政赤字为由将哥伦比亚进一步降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将哥伦比亚的信用评级下调一档，将其降至垃圾级，理由是持续的巨额预算赤字将加重该国的债务负担。【原文：Fitch Ratings downgraded Colombia’s credit rating one notch deeper into junk territory, citing persistently large budget deficits that will add to the nation’s debt load.】

item.title: 房价下跌，新加坡大华银行在香港和中国房地产贷款方面举步维艰
item.description: 新加坡一家顶级银行在香港和中国房地产上的巨额赌注正适得其反，该银行正面临着该地区日益恶化的房地产市场带来的越来越多的麻烦。【原文：A large wager on Hong Kong and China real estate is backfiring on one of Singapore’s top banks, which is facing up to mounting troubles in the region’s deteriorating property markets.】

item.title: 台湾保险公司因储备金增加而削减货币对冲至创纪录水平
item.description: 台湾的人寿保险公司已将货币对冲降至历史最低水平，同时提高了对外汇风险的缓冲，使自己有更大的能力应对任何潜在的波动。【原文：Taiwan’s life insurers have cut their currency hedging to a record low, while boosting their buffer against foreign-exchange risks to give themselves a greater capacity to ride out any potential volatility.】

item.title: 美国就业数据不温不火，未能刺激降息押注，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 周二美国就业数据低迷，但并未打动市场对进一步降息的预期，黄金走势平稳。【原文：Gold was steady, after sluggish US jobs data on Tuesday didn’t move the needle on expectations for more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: KIK Custom 获得包括 Oaktree 在内的新贷款人的救援贷款
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，KIK Custom Products Inc.从包括橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）在内的新贷款人处获得了 1.5 亿美元的救援贷款，以帮助这家清洁产品公司弥补潜在的流动资金缺口。【原文：KIK Custom Products Inc. received a $150 million rescue loan from new lenders, including Oaktree Capital Management to help the cleaning-products company bridge a potential liquidity shortfall, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 中国市场的复苏取决于黯淡经济的转机
item.description: 中国市场今年摆脱了 "不可投资 "的标签。投资者认为，要想永远摆脱 "不可投资 "的标签，国内经济必须加速发展，这样才能避免牛市昙花一现。【原文：China’s markets shed the “uninvestable” tag this year. To bury it for good, investors say an acceleration in the domestic economy is needed so the bullishness doesn’t fizzle out.】

item.title: 墨西哥炼油业创 11 年新高，关键工厂加紧生产
item.description: 历时三年，墨西哥最大的石油加工厂终于接近满负荷运转。这使得墨西哥的炼油量达到了十多年来的最高水平。【原文：It took about three years, but now Mexico’s largest oil-processing plant is finally running at close to full tilt. That’s sending refining in the nation to the highest in more than a decade.】

item.title: 邦迪海滩枪手从昏迷中苏醒，第一场葬礼即将举行
item.description: 在悉尼邦迪海滩举行的光明节庆祝活动中，父子二人杀害了 15 人，其中幸存的枪手在昏迷后已恢复意识。【原文：The surviving gunman from the father-son duo that killed 15 people on Sydney’s Bondi Beach during a Hanukkah celebration has regained consciousness after being in a coma.】

item.title: Waymo 寻求超过 150 亿美元的投资，估值接近 1000 亿美元
item.description: Alphabet 公司的自动驾驶部门 Waymo 正在讨论以接近 1000 亿美元的估值融资超过 150 亿美元，此轮融资由其母公司牵头。【原文：Waymo, Alphabet Inc.’s autonomous driving unit, is in discussions to raise more than $15 billion at a valuation near $100 billion, in a round led by its parent company.】

item.title: 据说 Medline 将通过扩大 IPO 筹集约 62.6 亿美元资金
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Medline 公司在一次规模较大的首次公开募股中筹集了约 62.6 亿美元，其股票定价接近市场定价范围的上限。【原文：Medline Inc. raised about $6.26 billion in an upsized initial public offering, pricing its shares near the top of a marketed range, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 斯克里普斯拒绝辛克莱敌意收购要约
item.description: 电视广播公司 E.W. 斯克里普斯公司（E.W. Scripps Co.【原文：Television broadcaster E.W. Scripps Co. rejected an unsolicited bid from rival Sinclair Inc. to acquire the company for $7 a share in cash and stock, saying it wasn’t in the best interests of shareholders.】

item.title: 不温不火的美国就业数据后，亚洲股市将出现波动：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一，追随华尔街的走势，此前低迷的美国就业数据对美联储进一步降息的押注几乎没有起到提振作用。石油跌至近五年来的最低点。【原文：Stocks in Asia were set for a mixed open, tracking moves on Wall Street after sluggish US jobs data did little to boost bets on further interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve. Oil dropped to its lowest in almost five years.】

item.title: 财政部葡萄酒部门推出改革方案，应对中国和美国经济放缓问题
item.description: 在奔富生产商应对主要市场需求疲软之际，Treasury Wine Estates Ltd.宣布对公司进行全面整顿，包括出售资产和削减成本。【原文：Treasury Wine Estates Ltd. announced a company-wide overhaul including asset sales and cost cuts, as the Penfolds producer tackles weakening demand in its key markets.】

item.title: SBI 新世界银行将在 2025 年日本第二大 IPO 后首次亮相
item.description: SBI 新世界银行有限公司在日本今年第二大首次公开募股中募集到 3220 亿日元（21 亿美元）资金，将于周三开始在东京交易。【原文：SBI Shinsei Bank Ltd. will start trading in Tokyo on Wednesday after raising ¥322 billion ($2.1 billion) in Japan’s second-biggest initial public offering of the year.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利超越高盛成为亚洲顶级股权交易安排人
item.description: 在亚洲股票销售大放异彩的一年里，有一家银行遥遥领先于其他银行：摩根士丹利。【原文：In a banner year for share sales in Asia, one bank has pulled far ahead of the rest: Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 中国芯片制造商 MetaX 首次公开募股超额认购后首次亮相
item.description: 继本月早些时候同行业的摩尔螺纹技术公司（Moore Threads Technology Co.【原文：China will have another major chip debut on Wednesday, eagerly watched by stock-market investors after the stellar gains by its peer Moore Threads Technology Co. earlier this month.】

item.title: 政治和灾难挑战泰国和印尼中央银行
item.description: 泰国和印度尼西亚的中央银行将在政治和天气等经济挑战的阴云下做出 2025 年最后一次利率决定。【原文：Central banks in Thailand and Indonesia will make their last interest rate decisions of 2025 under a cloud of economic challenges from politics to weather.】
